title: More disconnects lately?
body:
Is it just me, or does there seem to be an increase in the number of sudden disconnections from ranked games in the last few weeks?

Used to be something that only happened on the odd occasion, but in four different instances in the last two weeks I've had two team members suddenly disconnect mid game.

Not sure if it's worth submitting a ticket over, but it certainly makes the preseason climb attempt a bit more challenging than I'd like.
